item.title: I'm blogging now
item.description: This isn’t the first time I’ve thought about writing a blog, and I’m finally giving in. Every so often I have thoughts that I want to get out. I usually write a long email and then delete it, but from now on, I’m going to put them here.

item.title: My cat
item.description: Last fall, I adopted a cat. He’s really cute and I keep some photos here for his fans.

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a machine learning developer currently interested in striking a balance between exciting novel research and the satisfaction of cutting-edge yet practical development. In the past, I’ve worked on computer vision research problems at startups like Groundlight AI and Nanotronics Imaging. I’m currently working at a stealth startup in Mountain View and finishing out my bachelor’s degree at Harvey Mudd College, and in the fall I’ll be working at the Anima AI Lab at Caltech as a Schmidt Fellow in Software Engineering.

item.title: Contact me
item.description: My email address is david dot h dot pitt at gmail dot com. I generally respond there, but I prefer to chat in real time. You can set up a meeting on my Calendly.
